name: Chiaroscuro (Alexandra | Kagura)
description:
CHIAROSCURO

Welcome to the Museum, a marvelous wonder housing the great works of the talented Fiore, a painter from a long lost era and a legend to the colorful city of  Florentia.

Aspiring artist Luca is among many hopeful painters seeking to showcase at the Storia Festival for a chance to marvel the judges with their works inspired by the great Fiore as he struggles to push back the memories of his own muddled past.

Yet within the walls of the Museum, secrets lurk at every hallway, and Luca soon comes to realize that his hero has been doing more than just watching him throughout his journey, while another presence calls out to him to open his eyes to more than what things seem.

GAME INFORMATION:

Chiaroscuro is an original  Interactive Story created with Twine 2.0 with limited audio clips and assets.

Sprites and background created by me on Clip Studio Paint + Photoshop CC. 

Additional stock image and audio credits can be found on the References Page.

Characters, story, and all original content belong to me. 

Thank you, and I hope you enjoy your journey into the Museum!
